name: concertedly
content:

so as to achieve a shared purpose: We can only succeed if we act concertedly against the enemy. The company's directors have been buying up shares concertedly.
in a determined and serious way: He has rarely been able to apply his talents concertedly. The whole article is concertedly upbeat.
